cluster_relations.rel_desc: Romantic body language is described as a subset or specific type of body language.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject concept is a more specific instance or subtype of the object concept within a taxonomy or hierarchy.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject is a more specific subtype or specialized form of the object within a conceptual or taxonomic hierarchy.
args.justification: All three relations express the same taxonomic subtype relation (specific gesture/body-language type to broader category). They already share the same canonical_rel_name and rel_cls; this call standardizes the canonical_rel_desc to a single, reusable, and slightly more general wording across all instances for schema consistency.
